title: The Deconstruction of the Economy You Know | Guests: Peter Schweizer & Rabbi Yitzchok Adlerstein | 3/24/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show by discussing ESG scores, the Great Reset, and the upcoming economic shift that might be coming sooner rather than later. Glenn and Stu discuss the media manipulation of Glenn’s book, “The Great Reset.” Author Peter Schweizer joins to discuss Hunter Biden’s laptop, a possible indictment of Hunter Biden, and the corruption that led to President Biden being compromised. Founding editor of Cross-Currents Rabbi Yitzchok Adlerstein joins to discuss what’s happening in Ukraine and the four rungs of anti-Semitism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
